Package.Description:
Installs Igor Pavlov's 7-Zip file compression utility, with the following modifications: - Associates the following file extensions with 7-Zip: 7z,bz2,bzip2,gz,gzip,lzh,lzma,rar,tar,tgz,zip *
* If you wish to associate with ALL the file extensions 7-Zip supports, go to "Step 1" of this installer and change the argument that's passed to the installer from "associate_common" to "associate_all"
Package.Name: 7-Zip v19.00

Package.Description:
Installs Igor Pavlov's 7-Zip file compression utility, with the following modifications: - Associates the following file extensions with 7-Zip: 7z,bz2,bzip2,gz,gzip,lzh,lzma,rar,tar,tgz,zip * ! Must be installed to matching architecture for File Associations to work! e.g. if you install 7-Zip x86 version to Windows x64, file associations will have to be manually set on a per-user basis
* If you wish to associate with ALL the file extensions 7-Zip supports, go to "Step 1" of this installer and change the argument that's passed to the installer from "associate_common" to "associate_all"
Package.Name: 7-Zip v19.00 (x86)

Package.Description: Installs Adobe Acrobat Reader DC, with the following changes: - Remove all prior versions of Adobe Reader from 6.x and up - Remove the Adobe Acrobat Update Service ( AdobeARMservice ) - Remove the Adobe Update scheduled task that gets installed (C:\Windows\tasks\Adobe Acrobat Update Task.job) - Disable all auto-update and telemetry collection options I could find via the bundled customization file - Disable all third-party service connectors (Dropbox, Google Drive, SharePoint, etc) via the bundled customization file
Package.Name: Adobe Acrobat Reader DC

Package.Description:
Installs Adobe AIR with the following customizations:
- No desktop or Start Menu shortcuts - Accepts the EULA for all users - Deletes Adobe Update service - Deletes Adobe Update Task Scheduler jobs
Package.Name: Adobe AIR v32.0.0.125

Package.Description: Installs Adobe Flash Player for Chrome, with the following changes: ! Kills running instances of Chrome - Removes all prior versions of Adobe Flash, Chrome version - Removes the Adobe Acrobat Update Service (AdobeFlashPlayerUpdateSvc) - Removes the Adobe Update scheduled task that gets installed (C:\Windows\tasks\Adobe Flash Player Updater.job)
Package.Name: Adobe Flash Player v32.0.0.223 (Chrome)

Package.Description: Installs Adobe Flash Player for Firefox (as a plugin), with the following changes: ! Kills running instances of Firefox - Removes all prior versions of Adobe Flash, Firefox/plugin version - Removes the Adobe Acrobat Update Service (AdobeFlashPlayerUpdateSvc) - Removes the Adobe Update scheduled task that gets installed (C:\Windows\tasks\Adobe Flash Player Updater.job)
Package.Name: Adobe Flash Player v32.0.0.223 (Firefox)

Package.Description: Installs Adobe Flash Player for Internet Explorer (as an ActiveX plugin), with the following changes: ! Kills running instances of Internet Explorer - Removes all prior versions of Adobe Flash, ActiveX version - Removes the Adobe Acrobat Update Service (AdobeFlashPlayerUpdateSvc) - Removes the Adobe Update scheduled task that gets installed (C:\Windows\tasks\Adobe Flash Player Updater.job)
Package.Name: Adobe Flash Player v32.0.0.223 (IE)

Package.Description: Installs Apple iTunes 64-bit, with the following customizations: - Uninstalls all prior versions first - Stops and deletes the "iPod Service" - Stops iTunesHelper - Deletes Public desktop iTunes.lnk
Package.Name: Apple iTunes v12.5.1.21

Package.Description: Installs CDBurnerXP (x64), with the following customizations: - Removes desktop icon - Associates ISO files with CDBurnerXP - Associates some other CD-related files with CDBurnerXP - Disables the background online update checker
Package.Name: CDBurnerXP v4.5.8.7042

Package.Description:
Installs CutePDF Writer with the following customizations: - Installs GhostScript v8.13 (can be disabled if you ONLY want PDF print functionality) - Disables the Ask toolbar - Deletes Start Menu shortcuts for CutePDF
Thanks to reddit.com/user/b0park for this package.
Package.Name: CutePDF Writer v3.0 (x86)

Package.Description: Installs the FileZilla client with the following customizations: - Removes any previous versions before installing
Package.Name: FileZilla Client v3.43.0

Package.Description:
Installs Gimp silently with the following flags:
Gimp v2.10.12 x86.exe /verysilent /norestart
Package.Name: Gimp v2.10.12 (x86)

Package.Description:
Installs Google Chrome Enterprise 64-bit, with the following customizations: ! Kills all running Chrome instances before beginning installation - Installs system-wide (vs. standard Chrome, which installs per-user) - Disables Google Update registry keys - Removes Google Update jobs in Task Scheduler ! Removes Google Update services (gupdatem and gupdate) *
* If you wish to disable this behavior, edit the batch file and remove the two lines that start with "sc delete"
Package.Name: Google Chrome v75.0.3770.100 (Enterprise)

Package.Description:
Installs Google Chrome Enterprise 32-bit, with the following customizations: ! Kills all running Chrome instances before beginning installation - Installs system-wide (vs. standard Chrome, which installs per-user) - Disables Google Update registry keys - Removes Google Update jobs in Task Scheduler ! Removes Google Update services (gupdatem and gupdate) *
* If you wish to disable this behavior, edit the batch file and remove the two lines that start with "sc delete"
Package.Name: Google Chrome v75.0.3770.100 (Enterprise) (x86)

Package.Description:
Installs Google Earth Pro, with the following customizations: - Installs for All Users - Disables Google Update registry keys - Removes Google Update jobs in Task Scheduler - Removes desktop shortcut ! Removes Google Update services (gupdatem and gupdate) **
** If you wish to disable this behavior, edit the batch file and remove the two lines that start with "sc delete"
Package.Name: Google Earth Pro v7.3.2

Package.Description:
Installs Java Development Kit 8, with the following customizations: - Removes all previous JDK8 x64 installations first (leaves any JDK7 or JDK8 x86 installations intact) - Adds "Development Tools" feature * Installs matching JRE 8 version ("PublicJreFeature feature") - Disables Java's auto-updater - Does not reboot
* Due to changes in the JDK installer by Oracle in this release, there are two options when installing the JDK: 1. Install JDK8 + the "public" JRE (aka standard/machine-wide) at the same time as the JDK, or 2. Install only JDK8 and wipe out any existing JRE8 installations.
Thus, if you already had JRE8 installed when you install JDK and instruct it not to install the "public" JRE, it will REMOVE any existing JRE8 installations that have matching architecture (e.g. JDK8 x64 will remove all JRE8 x64 installations). So your options are either:
a) let the JDK8 installer load the matching JRE8 binary to Program Files, or b) let the JDK8 installer blow away any matching-architecture JRE8 installations
There is no option to JUST install JDK8 without touching JRE8 installations.
Package.Name: Java Development Kit 8 update 211

Package.Description:
Installs Java Development Kit 8, with the following customizations: - Removes all previous JDK8 x86 installations first (leaves any JDK7 or JDK8 x64 installations intact) - Adds "Development Tools" feature * Installs matching JRE 8 version ("PublicJreFeature feature") - Disables Java's auto-updater - Does not reboot
* Due to changes in the JDK installer by Oracle in this release, there are two options when installing the JDK: 1. Install JDK8 + the "public" JRE (aka standard/machine-wide) at the same time as the JDK, or 2. Install only JDK8 and wipe out any existing JRE8 installations.
Thus, if you already had JRE8 installed when you install JDK and instruct it not to install the "public" JRE, it will REMOVE any existing JRE8 installations that have matching architecture (e.g. JDK8 x64 will remove all JRE8 x64 installations). So your options are either:
a) let the JDK8 installer load the matching JRE8 binary to Program Files, or b) let the JDK8 installer blow away any matching-architecture JRE8 installations
There is no option to JUST install JDK8 without touching JRE8 installations.
Package.Name: Java Development Kit 8 update 211 (x86)

Package.Description:
Installs Java Development Kit 11.0.2, with the following customizations: - Removes all previous JDK10 x64 installations first (leaves any JDK7 or JDK8 x86 installations intact) - Adds "Development Tools" feature * Installs matching JRE 9 version ("PublicJreFeature feature") - Disables Java's auto-updater - Does not reboot
* Due to changes starting in JDK8 by Oracle, there are two options when installing the JDK: 1. Install JDK10 + the "public" JRE (aka standard/machine-wide) at the same time as the JDK, or 2. Install only JDK10 and wipe out any existing JRE9 installations.
Thus, if you already had JRE9 installed when you install JDK and instruct it not to install the "public" JRE, it will REMOVE any existing JRE9 installations that have matching architecture (e.g. JDK10 x64 will remove all JRE9 x64 installations). So your options are either:
a) let the JDK10 installer load the matching JRE9 binary to Program Files, or b) let the JDK10 installer blow away any matching-architecture JRE9 installations
There is no option to JUST install JDK10 without touching JRE8 installations.
Package.Name: Java Development Kit 11.0.2 (x64)

Package.Description:
Installs Java Runtime 8, with the following options: - Removes all previous JRE8 x64 installations first (leaves any JRE7 or JRE8 x86 installations intact) - Disables Java's auto-updater - Does not reboot - Forces Java Web Security level to MEDIUM* (default in all prior versions of JRE). Thanks to reddit.com/user/matt314159 for this contribution.
* If you wish to disable this behavior, edit the 'deployment.properties' file and comment out or delete the line that reads 'deployment.security.level.locked'
Package.Name: Java Runtime 8 update 211

Package.Description:
Installs Java Runtime 8, with the following options: - Removes all previous JRE8 x86 installations first (leaves any JRE7 or JRE8 x64 installations intact) - Disables Java's auto-updater - Does not reboot - Forces Java Web Security level to MEDIUM* (default in all prior versions of JRE). Thanks to reddit.com/user/matt314159 for this contribution.
* If you wish to disable this behavior, edit the 'deployment.properties' file and comment out or delete the line that reads 'deployment.security.level.locked'
Package.Name: Java Runtime 8 update 211 (x86)

Package.Description:
Installs Java Runtime 9, with the following options: - Removes all previous JRE9 x64 installations first (does not specifically target JRE6-8 installations for removal) - Disables Java's auto-updater - Does not reboot - Forces Java Web Security level to MEDIUM* (default in all JRE7 and earlier). Thanks to reddit.com/user/matt314159 for this contribution.
* If you wish to disable this behavior, edit the 'deployment.properties' file and comment out or delete the line that reads 'deployment.security.level.locked'
Package.Name: Java Runtime 11.0.2 (x64)

Package.Description:
Installs KpyM's Telnet/SSH server for Windows, with the following customizations: - Starts SSH server listening on port 22 - Does NOT start a telnet listener *
If the target machine is on a domain, the login format is as follows: - username@domain.com
* if you require this, edit the kts.ini file in C:\Program Files\KTS\ and set the 'use_ssh' variable to 0 instead of 1
Package.Name: KpyM Telnet/SSH Server v1.19c (x86)

Package.Description: Installs LibreOffice with the following changes: ! Kills running instances of LibreOffice - Removes old versions of LibreOffice - Associates open document formats to LibreOffice (Microsoft associations unchanged) - Removes all language files except English (US)
Package.Name: LibreOffice v6.2.7

PackageStepCondition.Version: WindowsXp, WindowsVista, Windows8, Server2003, Windows81, Windows10, AllServers

Package.Description: Installs Microsoft Silverlight Multimedia Framework, with the following customizations: - Disables the auto-updater via the following two Microsoft-supported methods: 1. The /noupdate flag 2. The "HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Microsoft\Silverlight\UpdateMode" registry key (0x00000002) - Deletes the icons the from All Users Start Menu
Package.Name: Microsoft Silverlight v5.1.50901.0

Package.Description: Installs Microsoft Silverlight Multimedia Framework, with the following customizations: - Disables the auto-updater via the following two Microsoft-supported methods: 1. The /noupdate flag 2. The "HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\Microsoft\Silverlight\UpdateMode" registry key (0x00000002) - Deletes the icons the from All Users Start Menu
Package.Name: Microsoft Silverlight v5.1.50901.0 (x86)

Package.Description:
Installs Mozilla Firefox ESR, with the following customizations*:
! Kills any running Firefox process first - Disables 'Always check to see if Firefox is the default browser on startup' - Disables 'Automatically install updates' - Disables 'Know your rights' bar from displaying on first run - Disables 'Telemetry' (request to send performance data) - Disables 'Firefox Health Report' - Disables 'Crash Reporter' - Disables 'Hello' embedded chat plugin - Disables 'Pocket' embedded plugin - Disables 'Tiles' new-tab screen (defaults to about:blank; user can change this setting) - Deletes All Users desktop icon
* These customizations come from the file '\autoconfig\cck2.cfg' in the package directory. If you want to change them, edit or delete this file. The config file was generated with the CCK2 addon for Firefox.
Package.Name: Mozilla Firefox ESR v68.0.0 (customized)

Package.Description:
Installs Mozilla Firefox ESR, with the following customizations*:
! Kills any running Firefox process first - Disables 'Always check to see if Firefox is the default browser on startup' - Disables 'Automatically install updates' - Disables 'Know your rights' bar from displaying on first run - Disables 'Telemetry' (request to send performance data) - Disables 'Firefox Health Report' - Disables 'Crash Reporter' - Disables 'Hello' embedded chat plugin - Disables 'Pocket' embedded plugin - Disables 'Tiles' new-tab screen (defaults to about:blank; user can change this setting) - Deletes All Users desktop icon
* These customizations come from the file '\autoconfig\cck2.cfg' in the package directory. If you want to change them, edit or delete this file. The config file was generated with the CCK2 addon for Firefox.

Package.Description:
Installs Mozilla Firefox, with the following customizations*:
! Kills any running Firefox process first - Disables 'Always check to see if Firefox is the default browser on startup' - Disables 'Automatically install updates' - Disables 'Know your rights' bar from displaying on first run - Disables 'Telemetry' (request to send performance data) - Disables 'Firefox Health Report' - Disables 'Crash Reporter' - Disables 'Hello' embedded chat plugin - Disables 'Pocket' embedded plugin - Disables 'Tiles' new-tab screen (defaults to about:blank; user can change this setting) - Deletes All Users desktop icon - Autoloads the latest version of the uBlock Origin plugin

Kills any running Firefox process first - Disables 'Always check to see if Firefox is the default browser on startup' - Disables 'Automatically install updates' - Disables 'Know your rights' bar from displaying on first run - Disables 'Telemetry' (request to send performance data) - Disables 'Firefox Health Report' - Disables 'Crash Reporter' - Disables 'Hello' embedded chat plugin - Disables 'Pocket' embedded plugin - Disables 'Tiles' new-tab screen (defaults to about:blank; user can change this setting) - Deletes All Users desktop icon - Autoloads the latest version of the uBlock Origin plugin

! Kills any running Firefox process first - Disables 'Always check to see if Firefox is the default browser on startup' - Disables 'Automatically install updates' - Disables 'Know your rights' bar from displaying on first run - Disables 'Telemetry' (request to send performance data) - Disables 'Firefox Health Report' - Disables 'Crash Reporter' - Disables 'Hello' embedded chat plugin - Disables 'Pocket' embedded plugin - Disables 'Tiles' new-tab screen (defaults to about:blank; user can change this setting) - Deletes All Users desktop icon

Package.Description:
Installs Mozilla Firefox ESR x86, with the following customizations*:
! Kills any running Firefox process first - Disables 'Always check to see if Firefox is the default browser on startup' - Disables 'Automatically install updates' - Disables 'Know your rights' bar from displaying on first run - Disables 'Telemetry' (request to send performance data) - Disables 'Firefox Health Report' - Disables 'Crash Reporter' - Disables 'Hello' embedded chat plugin - Disables 'Pocket' embedded plugin - Disables 'Tiles' new-tab screen (defaults to about:blank; user can change this setting) - Deletes All Users desktop icon

Package.Name: Mozilla Firefox v68.0.0 ESR (customized) (x86)

Package.Description:
Installs Mozilla Thunderbird with the following customizations: ! Kills any running instances of Thunderbird before installing - Points Thunderbird to a master configuration file on the network instead of using the local configuration files. This lets us perform domain-wide tweaks to Thunderbird settings easily.* - Disables auto-updater (extension updates remain enabled) - Disables the 'Know your rights' banner at the bottom of the screen - Disables the request to send performance data - Disables the Migration Assistant - Disables the What's New page from showing after an upgrade
* The master settings file it points to is located here: '\\DOMAIN.NAME\netlogon\applications\thunderbird\thunderbird-global-settings.js' * If you wish to disable these settings, remove the three *.js files in the package directory
Package.Name: Mozilla Thunderbird v60.8.0 (customized) (x86)

Package.Description: Installs Notepad++ silently, with the following customizations: - Kills any running instance of Notepad++ first - Disables auto-updater by deleting the folder "C:\Program Files\Notepad++\updater" - Deletes the DSpellCheck plugin
Package.Name: Notepad++ v7.7.1

Package.Description:
Install's Pale Moon, an open-source, Windows-optimized, binary-compatible Firefox build, with the following modifications: - Removes desktop icon
Thanks to Moonchild ( http://www.palemoon.org/ ) for redistribution permission.
Package.Name: Pale Moon v28.6.0.1

Package.Description:
Install's Pale Moon, an open-source, Windows-optimized, binary-compatible Firefox build, with the following modifications: - Removes desktop icon
Thanks to Moonchild ( http://www.palemoon.org/ ) for redistribution permission.
Package.Name: Pale Moon v28.6.0.1 (x86)

Package.Description: Installs the Spark instant messaging client (for use with OpenFire chat servers), with the following customizations: - Silent install - Deletes "All Users" desktop icon - Deletes the OTR ("Off the Record") encryption plugin
Package.Name: Spark v2.8.3 (x86)

Package.Description:
Installs TightVNC, with the following customizations: - Removes any prior versions of TightVNC - Starts the TightVNC listener/server - Hides the control panel in the system tray - Disables the "hide desktop wallpaper" option - Deletes "All Users" Start Menu links to TightVNC - Sets the remote access password to 'nettech2' * - Sets the control panel protection password to 'nettech2' *
* These settings come from the registry file that gets imported. If you wish to disable these customizations, remove the registry file.
Package.Name: TightVNC v2.8.23

Package.Description:
Installs TightVNC, with the following customizations: - Removes any prior versions of TightVNC - Starts the TightVNC listener/server - Hides the control panel in the system tray - Disables the "hide desktop wallpaper" option - Deletes "All Users" Start Menu links to TightVNC - Sets the remote access password to 'nettech2' * - Sets the control panel protection password to 'nettech2' *
* These settings come from the registry file that gets imported. If you wish to disable these customizations, remove the registry file.
Package.Name: TightVNC v2.8.23 (x86)

Package.Description:
Installs UltraVNC with the following customizations: - Removes icons (desktop, start menu) - Removes system tray icon - Starts listening server - Sets connection password of 'nettech2' *
* If you wish to change this, use the password generator tool located in: $(Repository)\ultravnc\ultravnc_password_generator and paste the resulting password in the 'ultravnc.ini' file in the same directory as the UltraVNC exe
Package.Name: UltraVNC v1.2.2.4 (x86)

Package.Description: Installs WinSCP silently, with the following customizations: - Disables OpenCandy advertising - Disables auto-reboot - Doesn't install a desktop icon - Associates .scp file extensions with WinSCP
Package.Name: WinSCP v5.15.2 (x86)
